spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Dagan is a 19th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Dagan has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Marshal Undead
entries: Unless Dagan is {@condition incapacitated}, he and undead creatures of his choice within 60 feet of him have advantage on saving throws against features that turn undead.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands, plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Hellfire Orb (1/Day)
entries: Dagan hurls a magical ball of fire that explodes at a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage and 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Dagan adds 6 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Dagan must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
